Manx: O Yee Ooilley Niartal,
English: O God Almighty,
Diplomatic: O Yee ooilley Niarthal.

Manx: Ta shin guee Ort jeh Dty vieys wooar,
English: We beseech thee from your great goodness
Diplomatic: Ta shin guee ort jeh dy vieys wooar,

Manx: Dy myghinagh dy chlashtyn nyn badjeryn.
English: To mercifull)y hear our prayers
Diplomatic: dy myghynagh dy clashyn nyn badjeryn.

Manx: Ta shin jannoo gys Dty Ardooashley flaunysagh,
English: That we make to Your heavenly Highness,
Diplomatic: Ta shin jannoo gys Dy Ardooashley flaunysagh,

Manx: Ass lheih yn reeriaght, as yn ashoon ain.
English: On behalf of our kingdom and nation,
Diplomatic: ass lhea yn reerreagh, as yn ashoon ain.

Manx: Ta shin goaill rish, Oh Hiarn,
English: We accept O Lord,
Diplomatic: Ta shin ghoaill rish, Oh Hiarn,

Manx: Ayns yn traa dy hee as fooar,
English: In the time of peace and favour
Diplomatic: ayns yn tra dy hee as fooar,

Manx: Lesh T’ou er vannaghey yn ashoon ain.
English: With which You have blessed our nation
Diplomatic: lesh T’ou er vannaghey yn ashoon ain.

Manx: Cha vel shin er churt Dhyt yn booise
English: That we have not given You the thanks
Diplomatic: Cha vel shin er churt dhyt yn booise

Manx: As yn ooashley va cairagh dhyt,
English: And the worship that was rightfully yours,
Diplomatic: as yn ooashley va cairragh dhyt

Manx: Dy gheddyn veih nyn laueyn.
English: To receive from our hands
Diplomatic: dy gheddyn veih nyn laueyn,

Manx: Dy myghynagh leih dooin nyn beccaghyn
English: To mercifully forgive us our sins
Diplomatic: Dy myghynagh leih dooin nyn beccaghyn

Manx: Liooroo ta shin er hoilçhin kerraghey.
English: By which we have deserved punishment
Diplomatic: liooroo ta shin er holchyns cerraghey.

Manx: As cur dooin dy vod mayd gynsagh
English: And give give us that we may learn
Diplomatic: As chur dooin dy vod mayd gynsagh,

Manx: Cairys veih Dty vriwnysyn, Ta foddey voïn
English: Justice from your jedgements, that are far from us
Diplomatic: cairys veih dy vriwnysyn. Ta foddey vooin

Manx: Cur chreenagh da ooilley,
English: Give wisdom to all
Diplomatic: Chur chreenagh da ooilley

Manx: Ta ayns reiltys ayns Keeil ny stayd.
English: That are in government, in Church or State,
Diplomatic: ta ayns reiltys ayns Keeil ny stayd.

Manx: Ghow ersooyl veih ny mastey ain
English: Take away from amongst us
Diplomatic: Ghow ersooyl veih ny mastey ain

Manx: ooilley yn voyrn as creoghys cree
English: All the pride and hardness of heart
Diplomatic: ooilley yn voayrn as croigys chree.

Manx: As ny lhig dooin soieagh beg
English: And do not let us despise
Diplomatic: As my lhig doin soieagh beg

Manx: Jeh Dty ghoo as dy annaghyn.
English: Your word and your commands.
Diplomatic: jeh dy ghoo as dy annaghyn.

Manx: Cur dooin yn spyrryd dy chraueeagh
English: Give us the spirit of religion
Diplomatic: Chur doin yn spyrryd dy craueeagh

Manx: As ooashley as cairys,
English: And worship and justice,
Diplomatic: as ooashley as cairys

Manx: As sheeltys myr ta cooie dooinyn
English: And great sobriety that is proper for us
Diplomatic: as sheeltys mor te cooie doinyn

Manx: Ta ghoaill rish dy ve chreesteeyn
English: That admit to be christians
Diplomatic: ta ghoaill rish dy ve chreesteeyn,

Manx: Dy vod ny bannaghtyn ta er ve ain
English: That the blessings we have had
Diplomatic: dy vod ny bannaghtyn ta er ve ain

Manx: Ayns soylley son tra liauyr.
English: In possession for a long time
Diplomatic: ayns solley son tra louyr,

Manx: Chammah spyrrydoil as dhoogysagh.
English: Both spiritual and natural
Diplomatic: chammah spyrrydooil as dhoogyssagh.

Manx: Dy vod ad trooid Dty Ard-chaaralys ve cummyt magh
English: That they may through Your visitation be perservering
Diplomatic: Dy vod ad trooid dy Ard chaaralys ve cummyt magh

Manx: Dooinyn as da nyn ghloan ny lurg ain.
English: For us and for our children after us
Diplomatic: dooinyn as da nyn ghloan, ny lurg ain.

Manx: Erskyn ooilley, ayns obbraghyn Dty laue,
English: Above all, in the works of your hand
Diplomatic: Erskin ooilley, ayns obraghyn dy laue,

Manx: Keid echey ve son foays ny skielley,
English: Whether it be for benefit or harm,
Diplomatic: ched eck e ve son foays ny skelley

Manx: ynsee shin eck dy chooilley chra.
English: Instruct us at all times
Diplomatic: ynsee shin eck dy chooilley chra

Manx: Dy hroggal seose nyn greeaghyn
English: To raise up our hearts
Diplomatic: Dy ghroggal seose nyn ghreeghyn

Manx: Erskyn yn seihll shoh wass,
English: Above the world down here
Diplomatic: erskin yn seihll shoh wass,

Manx: Gys Dty reeriaght flaunysagh,
English: To Your heavenly kingdom,
Diplomatic: gys dy reereaght flaunysagh.

Manx: Raad nagh bee pian ny scaaghyn,
English: Where there will not be pain or shadows
Diplomatic: Raad nagh bee pien ny seaghyn,

Manx: Caggey, ny eulys, ny smoo.
English: Fighting, or fury, any more.
Diplomatic: caggey ny eulys, ny smoo.

Manx: As mor T’ou er choyrt currym doin
English: And as You have given us a duty
Diplomatic: As mor T’ou er churt currym doin

Manx: Dy ve graihagh er nyn noidyn,
English: To love our enemies
Diplomatic: dy ve graihagh er nyn noidyn,

Manx: As dy phrayal son ocsyn,
English: And to pray for those
Diplomatic: as dy freeayl son ocksyn,

Manx: Ta dy ghoanlyssagh jannoo tranlaase orrin.
English: That blindly oppress us.
Diplomatic: ta dy ghoanlysagh jannoo tranlaase orryn.

Manx: Ta shin guee ort dy leeideil shin
English: We beseech Thee to lead us,
Diplomatic: Ta shin guee ort dy leeiddeil shin

Manx: Dy yeaghyn lheid yn chymmey shen,
English: To show compassion like that
Diplomatic: dy yeaghyn lheid yn chymmey shen

Manx: Da nyn noidyn Ayns yn caggey shoh.
English: To our enemies in this war.
Diplomatic: da nyn noidyn Ayns yn caggey shoh.

Manx: As lheid yn ghraih shen er cairys,
English: And such a love as that for justice,
Diplomatic: As lheid yn ghraih shen er cairys,

Manx: As myghin, myr t’eh cooie dauesyn
English: And mercy as is proper for those
Diplomatic: as myghyn, mor ta cooie dausyn

Manx: Aa prayal dy jeanagh Oo, O, Hiarn.
English: That pray earnestly to You, O, Lord.
Diplomatic: ta preayll dy jeanagh Oo oh Hiarn

Manx: Goll magh marish nyn sheshaght caggee,
English: Going out with our army,
Diplomatic: Gholl magh marish nyn sheshaght caggee.

Manx: Clash rooin ayns ny padjeryn shoh.
English: Hear us in these prayers,
Diplomatic: Clash rooin ayns ny padjeryn shoh.

Manx: Er graih yn fer ta eddyr ain.
English: Foe the love of the one who is between us
Diplomatic: Er graih yn fer ta eddyr ain.

Manx: Nyn fer kionniee Yeesey Chreest nyn Chiarn.
English: Our Redeemer Jesus Christ our Lord.
Diplomatic: Nyn fer kionniee Yeesey Chreest nyn Chiarn.

Manx: Amen.
English: Amen.
Diplomatic: Amen

Manx: Scrieut yn chied laa as feed jeh yn chied vee jeh’n geurey ayns yn vlein nee cheead yeig
English: Written on the twenty-first of november in the year nineteen hundred.
Diplomatic: Scrieut yn ched laa as feed jeh yn ched vee jeh’n geurey ayns yn vlein nee cheead yeig.

Manx: Liorish E Farquhar
English: By E. Farquahr
Diplomatic: Liorish E Farquhar
